name: Goodbye In Summer /Rough Demo/
description:
This game is very rough and there isn't a lot to do yet. (Yet! I do plan on fully developing this project at a later date. Please bear with me)

Known issues:

- Not a lot to do
- Cut-scene backgrounds duplicate themselves
- Piano cut-scene has no piano music
- Can barely see main character during piano cut-scene
- You can't actually race Jo
